Petrona hostel is a quiet space in a residential area, but very close to bars and restaurants of the capital. Every two weeks, we organize music and friends events at our cafe.

Petrona hostel offers you a space where you can stay in rooms with minimalist design. We have a shared dorm as well as private rooms.

Situated in Bogot√°, within 1.6 km of Corferias International Exhibition Center and 3.8 km of El Campin Stadium, Petrona Hotel offers accommodation with a bar. The property is around 6 km from Bolivar Square, 6 km from Luis Angel Arango Library and 6 km from Quevedo's Jet. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.
All units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.
T Zone is 9 km from Petrona Hotel, while Unicentro Shopping Mall is 13 km from the property.

description.description: Petrona is a very bright, modern and cozy hostel. You can work in private offices and our open spaces, all with WiFi connection and electricity outlets. Also, enjoy special coffees from independent coffee growers from different regions of the country. Our cafe is open from 9 am to 9 pm and the hotel is open 24 hours a day.
